    Searching the NPPES

Search the Medicare Physician & Other Practitioners - by Provider and Service API

Source: R/prov_mcr_phys_pract.R
prov_mcr_phys_pract.Rd

The Medicare Physician & Other Practitioners by Provider and Service dataset provides information on use, payments, and submitted charges organized by National Provider Identifier (NPI), Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) code, and place of service.

Usage

prov_mcr_phys_pract(npi, year = "2020")

Source

https://data.cms.gov/provider-summary-by-type-of-service/medicare-physician-other-practitioners/medicare-physician-other-practitioners-by-provider-and-service

Arguments

npi

10-digit National Provider Identifier (NPI)

year

year between 2013-2020, in YYYY format

Value

A tibble containing the NPI(s) searched for, the date-time the search was performed, and a list-column of the results.

Details

Information on services and procedures provided to Original Medicare (fee-for-service) Part B (Medical Insurance) beneficiaries by physicians and other healthcare professionals; aggregated by provider and service.

Examples

prov_mcr_phys_pract(npi = 1003000126, year = "2020")
#>   year Rndrng_NPI Rndrng_Prvdr_Last_Org_Name Rndrng_Prvdr_First_Name
